fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Trade, Competition, Consumers, International co-operation and development, Customs, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Digital economy and society
inter_groups: Following the work of the Interest Group on Patient Access to Healthcare
eu_initiatives: EU initiatives pertaining to pharmaceutical policy, industrial policy, health policy (both human and animal) and trade policy, eg, Clinical Trials Regulation, Data Protection Regulation, Public Procurement Directive, Joint Action on Chronic diseases, European Active & Health Ageing Partnership, Crossborder Healthcare Directive, and Falsified Medicines Directive.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
persons_accredited_for_access_to_europea: AZAIS#BORIS, DESAINT#Nilsy, Earnshaw#David, JANSEN#Sven, Lane#Stephanie, Noya#Sophie, Ouriaghli#Loubna, QUILICI#Sibilia, Vermooten#Julie, WOJCIECHOWSKI#Krzysztof
membership: MSD is a member of Business Europe, EFPIA, EBE, VE, Eucope, EuropaBio, and AmCham EU, Bruegel, Friends of Europe, EURORDIS, EAPM, Kangaroo Group, PAC (Public Affairs Council), CER (Centre of European Reform), EPC (European Policy Council), AECA (The American European Community Association), ACEBA (American-Central European Business Association), Press Club
position: Associate Vice-President Public Policy Europe & Canada
relevant_communication: Working actively with several industry associations. Organizing events on industrial and health policy. Engaging with EU policy makers in EU institutions.
goals__remit: MSD is a global healthcare leader who is working to help the world be well. Through our medicines, vaccines, biologic therapies, and consumer and animal products, we work with customers and operate in more than 140 countries to deliver innovative health solutions. We also demonstrate our commitment to increasing access to healthcare through far-reaching programmes that donate and deliver our products to the people who need them. MSD. Be well. For more information, visit www.msd.com.
